title: Coronavirus: Why 'shark attacks' won’t go down as Covid deaths
description: Infowars claims about testing, the viral body bag video in Brazil and other claims fact-checked.

title: Week in pictures: 9-15 May 2020
description: A selection of news photographs taken around the world this week.

title: Eurovision 2019 winner Duncan Laurence 'missing the bubble'
description: Eurovision 2019 winner Duncan Laurence on this year's cancelled contest and how the UK could win in future.

title: Coronavirus: Grieving together with a yellow heart
description: The placing of the symbol in windows is allowing families to celebrate those who have died with Covid-19.

title: Coronavirus: Should furloughed workers offer their skills for free?
description: Furloughed workers are offering their skills for free, but some freelancers are taking issue with the trend.

title: NFL's Deandre Baker and Quinton Dunbar charged with armed robbery
description: Deandre Baker of the New York Giants and Quinton Dunbar of the Seattle Seahawks both face charges.

title: Coronavirus: 'Lockdown is opportunity of a lifetime for bike lanes'
description: Gil Penalosa of urban reform group 8 80 Cities says lockdown is the right time to make cities more bike-friendly.

title: Afghan maternity ward attackers 'came to kill the mothers'
description: The attack on an Afghan maternity unit was "methodical" and no mistake, says charity director.

title: Coronavirus: Your pictures of working at home
description: Our readers reveal the new normal of life during a pandemic.

title: Coronavirus lockdown exit plan for Wales 'puts health first'
description: Wales' first minister announces a cautious plan for easing restrictions on daily life.

title: Coronavirus: Unions demand assurances over 1 June school plan
description: Teachers say they want to see the scientific evidence that it is safe to open schools in England.

title: Katherine Ryan says miscarriage made her feel 'shameful’
description: "I felt embarrassed for getting excited before the loss," she says of her miscarriage in February.

title: Coronavirus: London congestion charge brought back with price rise
description: The charge will resume on Monday and go up in June to avoid a build up of traffic in the capital.

title: Brexit: UK warns 'very little progress' made in EU trade talks
description: Disagreements remain over fishing rights and how closely the UK will follow EU laws and standards.

title: Coronavirus vaccine: Macaque monkey trial offers hope
description: Six rhesus macaque monkeys were vaccinated and then exposed to the virus.

title: The key questions for the Premier League to restart
description: The Premier League hopes for a return to action on 12 June, with matches played behind closed doors. BBC Sport's Simon Stone answers the key questions.

title: Coronavirus: Royal Mail boss Rico Back in surprise exit
description: Rico Back leaves after less than two years in the role amid reports he ran the firm from Switzerland.

title: Coronavirus: Surrogate babies stranded in Ukraine
description: Babies born to surrogate mothers are stuck in Ukraine due to coronavirus lockdown measures.

title: Rick Bright: 'Ousted' vaccine expert says US is facing its 'darkest winter'
description: The dire warning on coronavirus comes from a former top health official who says he was ousted.

title: Rugby union: All summer tours off amid coronavirus pandemic
description: All of this summer's tours have been postponed because of the coronavirus pandemic, World Rugby confirms.

title: 'My heart ruled my head' as romance scams rise
description: A charity warns of heavy losses as one victim tells the BBC 'my heart ruled my head'.

title: Coronavirus: Baltic states open a pandemic 'travel bubble'
description: Residents of Estonia, Latvia and Lithuania can now travel freely between the three nations.

title: FA Cup final Rewind: Vote for which game you want to relive
description: Choose which of thesse nine classic FA Cup finals you want the BBC to show on 23 May.

description: William Hill says gamblers have switched to "alternative sports" during the coronavirus pandemic.

title: Mike Tyson wows Donald Trump in a 'Greatest Fight' with Michael Spinks
description: Mike Tyson reached the pinnacle and Michael Spinks hit the canvas - but what might the champion have become if he'd taken Frank Sinatra's advice?

description: A study suggesting up to 19 million people in the UK may have had the virus is among the front-page stories.

title: Coronavirus: Doctors 'told not to discuss PPE shortages'
description: One NHS doctor tells BBC Newsnight he was told by managers at his hospital to "stop causing a fuss".

title: Coronavirus: How 'overreaction' made Vietnam a virus success
description: Vietnam chose to prevent rather than fight Covid-19, a strategy which means it has had no virus deaths.

title: Coronavirus: How the pandemic is relaxing US drinking laws
description: Many states are relaxing rules about selling alcohol to-go to accommodate Covid closures.

title: Coping with coronavirus in a war zone
description: How a British charity is helping war-torn Libya deal with the coronavirus pandemic.
